title: Fear woman
creator_credit: Elspeth MacDougall and United Nations Television
brief_description: A documentary about the status of women in Ghana, noting their reputation for independence. Points out that the women run a large part of the retail trade of the country, and that they are beginning to enter into areas which have power and influence.
description: A documentary about the status of women in Ghana, noting their reputation for independence. Points out that the women run a large part of the retail trade of the country, and that they are beginning to enter into areas which have power and influence.
